TopicTitle: Weird UI glitch happens from VAB, Crew center, and possibly all the other buildings in the KSC

Articles.Content:
KSP.log
Output log
Imgur link to the UI bugs
I have a feeling this is caused by a graphical mod, but I really don't know if that is actually true to be fair. Also, here is the entire mod list since there is probably the chance that one of these mods might be affecting the UI

  • Flight Manager for Reusable Stages (FMRS) Continued (FMRSContinued 1.2.9.1)
  • Action Groups Extended (AGExt 1:2.4.0.1)
  • Alcubierre Warp Drive (Stand-alone) (AlcubierreStandalone 1.3.0.0)
  • All Y'All (AllYAll 1:0.11.18.3)
  • Antenna Helper (AntennaHelper 2:1.0.7.1)
  • AT Utils (AT-Utils v1.9.0)
  • AutoAsparagus (AutoAsparagus 1:v2.2.18)

  • Progress Parser (ProgressParser 11.0)

  • Real Plume (RealPlume 2:v13.1.0)

  • RecoveryController (RecoveryController 0.0.4)

  • StageRecovery (StageRecovery 1.9.2.2)
  • Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux (StationPartsExpansionRedux 1.3.2)

  • Taerobee - Stockalike X-1 & More (Taerobee 1:3.0)
  • TextureReplacer (TextureReplacer v4.1)
  • Textures Unlimited (TexturesUnlimited 1.5.9.24)
  • Throttle Controlled Avionics (ThrottleControlledAvionics v3.6.1)
  • ToadicusToolsContinued (ToadicusToolsContinued 0.22.4.3)
  • Toolbar (Toolbar 1:1.8.0.5)
  • Toolbar Controller (ToolbarController 1:0.1.9.4)
  • Trajectories (Trajectories v2.3.0)
  • TriggerAu Flags (TriggerAu-Flags v2.9.3.0)
  • TweakableEverythingContinued (TweakableEverythingCont 0.2.0)
  • TweakScale - Rescale Everything! (TweakScale v2.4.3.10)
  • Universal Storage II (UniversalStorage2 1.7.0.10)
  • USI Core (USI-Core 1.3.0.0)
  • USI Tools (USITools 1.3.0.0)
  • Waypoint Manager (WaypointManager 2.8.1)
  • Zero MiniAVC (ZeroMiniAVC 1:1.1.0.1)

That's quite a mod list, I give you that  

Pretty sure there are a couple of mods you're using that are not compatible / updated yet to 1.9.0, e.g. TexturesUnlimited 1.5.9.24 is listed as compatible with 1.8.1, not 1.9.0. Same with TextureReplacer v4.1, ReStock 1.0.3, etc.

I suggest you check if all your mods are good for 1.9.0

Also, I did read a couple of times in the past that UI scalings not 100% often caused weird graphic anomalies.
